byline.contributor: Laurie Goodstein and Todd Heisler reported from Philadelphia, and Daniel J. Wakin from New York.
byline.original: By LAURIE GOODSTEIN and DANIEL J. WAKIN

lead_paragraph: The pope turned penitent and pastor Sunday, declaring himself “overwhelmed by shame” at the sexual abuse by his clergy, visiting a local jail and bidding farewell with a huge downtown Mass.

headline.main: Pope Francis Ends Visit With Mass After Meeting Bishops and Inmates

snippet: The pope turned penitent and pastor Sunday, declaring himself “overwhelmed by shame” at the sexual abuse by his clergy, visiting a local jail and bidding farewell with a huge downtown Mass.
